channel.title: Fixed on Matias Leidemer's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Fixed on Matias Leidemer's Blog

item.title: about
item.description:
Hi

My name is Matias Leidemer, I am a software developer based in Novo Hamburgo, Brazil. I am currently working for stickermule.

I like to write code that writes code, listen to music, watch movies and all kinds of animals.

This page is powered by gohugo, with the cocoa theme and hosted using github pages.

If you feel like talking to me, you can use one of the social links at the bottom of this page.
